hero.title: I Build Intelligent Digital Experiences.
hero.subtitle: Full Stack Developer & Media Buyer Expert — combining technology and strategy to help brands grow.

about.title: About Me
about.bio: I'm a Moroccan full stack developer and media buyer, currently CEO & Co-Founder at brandhub.ma and Co-Founder at Multi Brands based in Morocco. I'm passionate about building scalable web apps, AI-powered assistants, and high-converting digital strategies. My mission is to merge technology, automation, and creativity to create measurable business impact.

innovation.title: We Lead the Innovation
innovation.description: Pioneering cutting-edge solutions with AI, 3D technology, and full-stack development. We transform ideas into immersive digital experiences that push boundaries and set new standards in the industry.

googleBI1.title: Google Business Intelligence Certificate
googleBI1.description: Completed comprehensive professional certification covering Business Intelligence foundations, data models & pipelines, and dashboard reporting. Demonstrated competency in transforming data into actionable insights and building stakeholder-focused dashboards.

googleBI2.title: Google Business Intelligence Certificate
googleBI2.description: Advanced 4-course certification including BI foundations, data insights, dashboards & reports, and AI-accelerated job search techniques. Expertise in creating data visualizations and business intelligence processes.

marketingDigital.title: Digital Marketing & Branding Certification
marketingDigital.description: Completed intensive 15-hour professional training in Digital Marketing and Branding strategies. Gained expertise in modern marketing techniques, brand development, and digital campaign execution.

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.quote1: Yahya delivered beyond expectations. His SaaS knowledge and clean design transformed our business.
testimonials.quote2: Professional, creative, and technically sharp. A pleasure to work with.
